item.title: By: Craig Grella
item.dc:creator: Craig Grella
item.description:
when i see quotes like that I laugh, but it's kind of sad actually. The way we sell, buy, consume is ever-changing. And if this guy is holding on to an old paradigm and refusing to understand how people want to do business today I can't help but think that guy (or dealership) is starting his downward spiral into nonexistence.
But it is Jersey, so maybe they'll just send a traffic jam to block the "go direct" transport in route to customer's delivery address!
item.content:encoded:
when i see quotes like that I laugh, but it’s kind of sad actually. The way we sell, buy, consume is ever-changing. And if this guy is holding on to an old paradigm and refusing to understand how people want to do business today I can’t help but think that guy (or dealership) is starting his downward spiral into nonexistence.

But it is Jersey, so maybe they’ll just send a traffic jam to block the “go direct” transport in route to customer’s delivery address!
